resources.string: The Gateway of India is a monument built during the 20th century in Mumbai City of Maharashtra state in Western India.It is located on the waterfront in the Apollo Bunder area in South Mumbai and overlooks the Arabian Sea.
Elephanta Caves are a network of sculpted caves located on Elephanta Island, or Gharapuri in Mumbai Harbour, 10 kilometres to the east of the city of Mumbai in the Indian state of Maharashtra.
Sanjay Gandhi National Park, formerly Borivali National Park, is a large protected area in the northern part of Mumbai city in Maharashtra State in India.

The Worli Fort is a fort built by the British in Worli, Mumbai, India.The fort, built on the Worli hill, overlooked the Mahim Bay at a time the city was made up of just seven islands. It was used as a lookout for enemy ships and pirates.
The Oberoi and Trident are two brands of five star hotels operated and sometimes owned by the Oberoi Hotels and Resorts located in several cities in India and across the world.
The Taj Mahal Palace Hotel is a "Heritage Grand" class five-star hotel located in the Colaba region of Mumbai, Maharashtra, India, next to the Gateway of India.
Watson\'s Hotel, now known as the Esplanade Mansion, is India\'s oldest surviving cast iron building.
Four Seasons Hotel, Mumbai is a five-star hotel and part of the Toronto-based Four Seasons luxury hotels and resorts.
The Cowasji Jehangir Hall is a museum of modern art and was part of the Institute of Science prior to 1996.
The Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Mumbai City Museum (formerly the Victoria and Albert Museum) is the oldest museum in Mumbai.
National Gallery of Modern Art hosts various exhibitions and art collections of famous artists, sculptors and different civilisations.
Nehru Science Center (NSC), Mumbai, is India\'s largest interactive science center
Inorbit Mall, Malad was the first shopping mall to open under the Inorbit umbrella, in 2004. and is counted among the better planned malls in the city.
Neptune Magnet Mall is planned to be the first international standard shopping center in the city. The mall has a Family Entertainment center call GLEOTST.
The mall was opened in two phases, the total size of the first phase of the development is 750 thousand square feet.
The mall was inaugurated in April 2008 and has an area of 750,000 square feet. Metro Junction Mall is one of the biggest in India.
